title: Route Citizen Complaint to Correct Department
description: A citizen submits a vague complaint about a 'mess' in a park. The agent must interpret the request and route it to the right department.

tasks.description: Receive a citizen service request with the description 'big mess near the pond in Central Park' and an attached photo.
Analyze the photo, which shows an overflowing trash can and litter on the ground.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly interprets the citizen's complaint.

tasks.description: Route the service request to the 'Parks and Recreation' department for cleanup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the ticket to the correct city department.
